title: Trump move to oust Fed governor jolts markets; Cook says she won’t leave
summary: President Trump said he fired Fed Governor Lisa Cook. Cook says the president can’t remove her and plans legal action. Investors reacted: the dollar slipped and markets turned cautious as traders bet on a September rate cut.

title: Iran and European powers meet as sanctions ‘snapback’ threat looms
summary: France, Britain and Germany are pressing Iran in Geneva to restore inspections and rein in enrichment before an Oct. 18 deadline or face restored UN sanctions. No direct U.S.-Iran talks.

title: NASA to launch TOMEX+ rockets tonight; colorful trails may be visible
summary: NASA targets 10:30 p.m.–3:30 a.m. ET to launch three sounding rockets from Wallops. The releases may create colorful vapor trails as scientists study winds high in the atmosphere.

title: YouTube’s ‘Hype’ tool goes global to boost rising creators
summary: YouTube is expanding its Hype feature worldwide, letting communities spotlight smaller channels to help them grow.

title: Spotify adds in‑app messages to share music and podcasts
summary: Spotify is rolling out direct messages in select markets so people can share tracks, podcasts and audiobooks without leaving the app.

title: Frontier buys $31M in ocean carbon removal from Planetary
summary: Frontier, backed by major tech firms, agreed to purchase 115,000+ tons of carbon removal from Planetary, which uses ocean alkalinity enhancement to lock away CO₂.

title: Maryland confirms rare screwworm infection tied to travel; patient recovered
summary: Officials reported a rare New World screwworm case in a Maryland traveler. Risk to the public is low, and USDA is scaling up prevention and monitoring along the border.

title: US Open: Venus Williams out in first round; top seeds set for day’s action
summary: Venus Williams lost in three sets to Karolina Muchova. Play continues with top names including Iga Świątek and Jannik Sinner on the schedule.
